评论详情: I was really disappointed with this shirt. I loved the design although the material seemed too thin, but after just one wash, it shrank significantly. It no longer fits me at all. I followed the care instructions on the label, so I'm really frustrated that this happened. I would not recommend this shirt if you want something that will last through multiple washes.
The embroidery was cute, but the size was small.
Beautiful!!  Delicate Chinese Blouse with Gorgeous Colors But NOT A TRUE Size 3XL.  Probably because it is from China.  Will give it to my Sidter for Christmas —  she wears a smaller size.
It was cute. Not sure what the fabric is - may contains cotton but doubt it is all cotton. Sadly, I ordered a Large, but it fit like a snug Medium.

Have had two of these blouses so order new colors. I wear medium. Both new ones were very small  and had strings of threads needing trimming.  Quality poor. Sad to see this and would not recommend buying. Very disappointed.
I like to colorful design, lots of strings here and there that need to be trimmed. Washed in cold water to air dry. I would size up it was snug on chest and shoulders.

Pretty little blouses with machine embroidery. Unfortunately, sizes run very very small! I ordered an XXL as advised by customer reviews ( normally wear L or XL USA size) but could not hardly get them over my head .. I returned , using their labels , but the return came back to me , saying “No such address” A mystery . Amazon refunded my money . These really should be labelled petite or for young teens … They are very cute !
It’s very short, not color or style shown & not from Mexico. It’s from China so the embroidery is very flat with lots of loose strings.
